headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: "Cash, what are the standout small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks riding the wave with LLY's big milestone?"

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: It seems the retail landscape is getting more competitive than a Black Friday sale at dawn!

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: The surge of LLY to a trillion-dollar valuation underscores investor confidence in the healthcare sector, particularly among smaller and mid-cap stocks. As quantitative ratings highlight potential opportunities, this trend could draw more attention to lesser-known players in the industry. With a rising tide lifting all boats, savvy investors might want to keep their eyes peeled for hidden gems.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Turning now to developments in the healthcare sector.
